Name: Sidekick
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of quarter orange slice wheel.
Review: Rich ripe pear (actually, there's no pear in this cocktail) and orange with a stabilising and cleansing hint of sour lime.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2003 at Temple Bar in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Sidekick contains 146 calories
